description: Application to vary the wording of condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref: P100603 (dated 26/06/2010) for works of partial demolition and alterations to the exterior of the station and adjacent building at basement, ground and first floor levels. The proposed amendment relates to the internal linking of the retail units at 40 and 41 Cowcross Street.
decision_conditions:
